mapper.select: SELECT t.*, i.img_name,i.img_size,i.img_url,i.sort as imgSort, i.recom_sort as imgRecomSort, m.name,m.duration,m.size,m.url, m.sort, m.recom_sort FROM t_audio_course_theme t LEFT JOIN t_csp_background_image i ON i.id = t.image_id AND i.hide=0 LEFT JOIN t_csp_background_music m ON m.id = t.music_id AND m.hide=0 WHERE t.course_id = #{courseId}

select * FROM t_csp_background_image
WHERE hide=0 AND recom_sort>0 ORDER BY recom_sort ASC
WHERE hide=0 AND sort>0 ORDER BY sort ASC

select * FROM t_csp_background_music
WHERE hide=0 AND recom_sort>0 ORDER BY recom_sort ASC
WHERE hide=0 AND sort>0 ORDER BY sort ASC
